name: Matthew Erisman
text: The Staff greeted us upon walking in the door and was very friendly throughout the process of making our pizzas. They placed appropriate amounts of toppings on the pizza. The pizza was cooked perfectly at the right temp without any burning ‚Ä¶More

name: J Overman
text: I highly recommend MOD Pizza if you desire authentic and delicious quality pizza, breadsticks, & salad. I love being able to customize my meals. The cheesy garlic bread is so good and the salads are scrumptious with lots of great add ins ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Turner
text: Food was fresh and delicious, all employees taking covid19 seriously! Prompt service.

name: Gold eagle Kroll
text: Friendly staff and a good selection to make your own pizza. They work under the subway principal. Pick the size pizza you want. Choose a type of pizza or do it yourself. They even have salads and dessert.

name: Bethany Huffaker
text: Pizza made right every time! I love their fresh lemonade drinks. And the no name cake is those addictive little nugget! I am so glad that I discovered MOD Pizza! Definitely will continue to come to this location since it is so convenient from my house!

name: Chase Austin
text: I've been to over a dozen different MOD Pizza locations in my life. It's become my go to easy food when I'm traveling around because it's fair priced and delicious, but mostly because the staff is always great. This location was the best ‚Ä¶More

name: Jolene Lovett
text: Amazing pizza!! The staff is amazing and I love the atmosphere. Definitely will be back!!

name: Jason Ivey
text: Service was pretty slow considering they advertise fast service on their sign.  The staff is friendly and attentive.  Not sure why it took so long to get through the line. That said, the pizza was pretty good.  They have a good selection of pizzas that are not the norm.  Enjoyed the spicy chicken sausage.

name: S Breen
text: What a fun experience. I wish I could recall the name of our pizza-maker. Tall tattooed gentleman. He was so very friendly and ready with suggestions and information! I had some food allergy concerns and he was able to help me find options ‚Ä¶More

name: Nancy Gonzalez
text: I love MOD! The only place I go for pizza. I love that it's so cheap regardless of how many toppings you get. And there's nothing like a wood fire oven baked pizza. The size is perfect on a regular MOD and I don't feel guilty about ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Hughes
text: Pizza was good. Lots of toppings snd options. Crust was thin like a bar pizza. Salad was good also..

name: Britt Dunning
text: Hubby decided he wanted to eat here after we left a different restaurant for barely acknowledging us.  We used to have one of these back where we're from, but it recently closed.  The place was clean, the food was good, and the employees ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Symonds
text: Great and very efficient service. Very tasty pizza and I was to make it low carb. Great place for a family. Very clean restrooms.

name: Marlan Church
text: Great food. Awesome energy. I really like the process and the way they took the time to explain it all to me.

name: Grant Wilson
text: Very busy. Salad was very good. Pizza was too light on the sauce and overcooked.

name: Joshua Miao
text: Friendly staff and the pizza is tasty. You can add as many variety of toppings. I generally go on weekdays and it's pretty quiet. Weekend tend to be a lot busier.

name: Mrs C
text: I just dont like the fact that they be leaning over your pizza when reaching into the containers for the ingredients. Then the fact that the utensils used in the brick oven are just standing on the floor. Most of the time crust is too tuff to eat. & if they are busy your pizza gets burnt.

name: keena stylesbykb
text: Sorry to say it wasn't seasoned. No taste. Cheese and chips is the only thing I enjoyed. Went home to doctor my burrito bowl.

name: James Johnson
text: Perfect place to eat pizza. Great people

name: Arnel Tanyag
text: Great food and money!!! I love the people and the experience. This is our favorite place for my youngest son, Nathan. Highly recommended and you should check it out.

name: Donte Pinkston
text: Who doesn't love mods am i right? They have the best pizza ever abd i don't even like pizza like that.

name: Maks D.
text:
Friendly staff and amazing pizza!!!
My favorite local pizza built the way I like it!!!

name: Zachary Hess
text: Always love Mod Pizza. However they were not offering quite a few menu items and pizza toppings because they said "low demand". Other than that Fast great experience.

text: I like the way my pizza is made in front of me hot and fresh.

text: The place was very clean, staff very friendly, pizza extremely tasty, perfect crust, and very fast. They deserve 6*! Will go back there for sure! Loved it!

text: Went in today for lunch, Staff very friendly and welcoming. Manner/owner chatter about spinach returning to menu since Covid... super nice and personable.. greeted me by name, Ashlyn. Highly recommend !

name: Kati Calletto
text: Wasn't terrible, but nothing special. A good selection of toppings, but the crust wasn't great.

name: Raven Brown
text: When you walk through the doors your always greeted by friendly, and engertic staff and the welcoming smell of pizza fills the air. You can choose from their classic pizza's and salads or build your own. The tops are endless your not charge ‚Ä¶More

name: Matrika Edwards
text: Food was great. Staff was very welcoming and Dave even spelled our names right! That never happens! Salad and meat lovers pizza was delicious.  This was 2nd time here and I plan on coming back.

name: Heidi Doyle
text: I love this concept. I'm not always sure what I want on my pizza, so it's great I can just pick and choose as the fancy strikes.

name: Robert Evans
text: Wow the food prepared here is outstanding and the staff members are very polite. I will come back again.

name: Jon Murdoch
text: Pizza is always custom made. Can't argue with quality.

name: Daniel Leonard

name: josh carpenter
text: Awesome place to get pizza if you want a change from the big names. So many customization possible, you can really make it your own.

name: Steven Wells
text: Went to MOD Pizza about a month ago, and just realized I didn‚Äôt leave a review. Came on here to check out the hours for today. This place is a GEM!! The staff was really helpful, and explained how everything worked. You pay one price for ‚Ä¶More

text: Pretty decent flavor. Like a bit thinner crust.

name: Alesia Banks
text: I ordered from Mod pizza for the first time. I started to give it a 1 star but didn‚Äôt think that was fair because the pizza was actually good. The problem: Why are they so doggone small? Luckily, it was just for me and my husband but I ‚Ä¶More

name: Derek Johnson
text: Coming from Seattle where MOD is everywhere with lines out the door, it was refreshing to see them open up in the VB area.  If you haven't been to one, make it a point to eat here.  Unique experience and very affordable.  Friendly staff, the GM even came and said hello while taking my plate away.  All that for under $10.

name: De De
text: They customer service is UNBELIEVABLE!!! They are so courteous and helpful, in addition to the pizza tasting amazing! I MIGHT stay in my neighborhood just because I'm close to MOD Pizza, lol!

name: TravoBum06
text: Awesome pizza!  Similar to a Pieology in California or a "Subway" of pizza, we normally make our own pizza on their app after our Walmart run.  By the time we get there, they are usually ready for the oven.  Staff is very friendly, and they are very orderly and organized.

name: Sarah Hudgins
text: Staff Was Nice And Good Customer Service I Created My Own Pizza Pepperoni Gam Bacon Chesse Garlic And The Marinira Sauce.  Overrall Pozza Was Great 10/10

name: Madelyn Kim
text: ice is really good. but very messy, unorganized, slow, hard to understand, lots of miscommunications, doesn't give a lot of toppings, they put your order number in the pizza (unsanitary) would not come again. boo

name: James Mello
text: Ask for the garlic rub on my cross and instead they just sprinkled some on top of the sauce other than that the food was good they're Dining room is closed which was a disappointment especially since you pay for a drink that is supposed to be free refills and the prices are still the same

text: First time trying Mod Pizza.  The young lady at the front did a good job explaining how it worked and the pizza was really good.

text: Very friendly staff and delicious food. This place is the subway of pizza - all the options and a fair price. We will definitely be back soon!

text: This place is excellent. No charge for additional toppings and amazing taste. The mad dog is excellent. Great options. Top 3 pizza in the area in my opinion.

name: Francesca Thompson
text: If I could leave a zero I would. I walked in to place an order to go and was completely ignored. Being the only customer there a greeting of some sort is expected. When I finally talked to someone they made themselves seem to bothered to ‚Ä¶More

Pizza was great

text: Ordered pizza online for a few essential coworkers to take out since this whole pandemic. Got 3 pizzas and they were burnt to a crisp. Very disappointing when you trust a local business to find out when you get back to work they just took your money and left you hungry with 3 burnt pizzas. We are never coming here again.

text: The motto is "superfast" but the service is super slow and inefficient. Employees don't seem to understand how to make pizza or move quickly. This place needs to take some lessons from Blaze Pizza.
